message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but you'll get a chance to negotiate later.
My turn! Let's be reasonable. This is a fair split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. Let's split the difference from your last offer.
Okay, Alice.  Let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.
